name: Heather Orr
text: We love Hungry Howie's and go there probably too often. They have great deals and are very fast.

name: David P
text: Recently moved to Katy.  Being a transplant from Michigan, I was Ecstatic to find a Hungry Howies near me.  I ordered On the app and my order was ready as promised, and I got home and the pizza was absolutely delicious just as I remember it ‚Ä¶More

name: Yuri Mozhaev
text: The best pizza I came across recently! Especially BBQ chicken. Cooking fast and delivering fast!

name: Chris Flora Nuss
text: First time here. Had great service. Salad was huge and delicious. Wish the pizza had more pepperoni but the flavor was good!

name: Catherine Smith
text:
Amazing!

name: Stocky Steve Stockwell
text: As good as any pizza in town for about the same price as the cheap chains. Fresh ingredients, great deals, and the customizable crusts make this easily my favorite place in town to get pizza!

name: Michael Dunn
text: Food was okay. Everything was overdone and burnt. Not the food we normally get. Was super disappointed, I have to drive over an hour to get here. Wife really loves this pizza place.

name: Sara Flores
text: I ordered online and did curbside pickup  it was fast and easy and the staff was very friendly and polite.

name: Katy Hahn
text: I‚Äôve only had this place twice, and it was enough for it to become my new favorite pizza place! Pizza was awesome with fresh tasting veggies, flavorful crust, and just the right amount of cheese. üëåüèº

name: Crystal McCraw
text: Very good pizza place, light breading, fresh and wings were meaty and service was great and fast.. we will most definitely be back for pizza nights...

name: Chris Favreau
text: So normally i loves hungry howies pizza. But this location not so much. Pizza was under cooked and in parts of the pizza was folded over and smashed like it was thrown in the delivery car. Also it was super soggy and over sauced and the ‚Ä¶More

name: David Rickerson
text:
Solid pizza, with a cool extra feature, the crust!
I normally don't know what to do with a pizza crust, big chunk of bread and all. However, H.H. has a neat twist where you can order your crust flavored.  I enjoyed the ranch-laced crust on mine.  Now I can enjoy the whole pizza.  Good Stuff!

name: S. M. Price
text: Not only do I love the pizza, but the people working here are always so kind.

name: Marcy McNeese Vu
text: We like to grab pizza here while visiting  family. Tasty and great prices! The young people working were nice and friendly to my five year old.

name: Samantha Mcneill
text: This place is amazing, the owners and managers are the best. I couldn‚Äôt ask for a better pizza place in my area. This is my go to spot

name: Kyle Robinson
text: Great Hungry Howie's location! The have always had thing ready quick for pick and have delivered fast as well. The customer service has been on point even helped carry out my order when I had my son with me in my arms. The crust flavors are really nice option to add to pizzas as well.

name: Cullen The Irishman
text: I was so excited today when me and my sister were driving down the street and saw hungry Howie's. I haven't had it in so long, so we had it for dinner. I ordered the deep dish with pepperoni, extra cheese and butter cheese crust and was as ‚Ä¶More

text: The food was delicious, the drinks were great, and the service was excellent.

name: Courtney Barrett
text: Delicious pizza at a great price!

name: j p
text: New place. Learning. Issues with oven. Burns pizza or deep dish is not cooked if they try to compensate. Management understands and provides good customer service to compensate. Getting over fixed. Hopefully pizzas will turn out better once ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott
text: My daughter loves the cheese bread

name: Marvin M
text: It was always a great place, fav for pizza, lately quality has diminished and ingredients are less and less, very disappointing

name: PMTasha B.
text: Brand new location opened on Highland Knolls! I am very happy I came here tonight for my pizza dinner. Pretty busy location for just opening, but the staff is very friendly,  and helpful! I am very pleased with wait time! Pizza is ‚Ä¶More

name: Winda Network
text: Not sure what the hype is all about. The pizza is not what you would expect. The thin crust was a bit harder and over cooked than expected and the regular crust was a bit doughy. Bit though to digest. Flavor wise was ok.  The slices were ‚Ä¶More

name: John Barry
text: My kid and I got a pizza tonight for a movie marathon. It was delicious. Family was pleasantly surprised at just how delicious and different it was. Awesome people and great food!

name: Aly Cat
text: Their pizza is really good for great prices as well! I usually share pizza and wings with my boyfriend and we always finish it the day of! Super tasty with butter/cheese crust :-)

name: Something Fishie
text: Really good pizza and pepperoni rolls. We had the garlic herb crust, and it was packed with flavor.  My favorite thing was the sweet young lady at the counter who was so cheerfully and efficiently greeting and serving people. Her 'Howie ‚Ä¶More

text: This location USED to be amazing!  However, for the second consecutive time my order was made incorrectly.  The manager Carlos insisted that the computer mustve done something wrong until I asked him what was he showing on his computer and ‚Ä¶More

name: Madison Bowles
text: great place love the pizza

name: Kim Richards
text: My sons and I tried Hungry Howies today for the first time and we loved it!  The pizza and Howie Cookie were both delicious and the service was amazing!  The manager, Shawn, is super nice!

name: Reese Blount
text: Good pizza and a variety of other options as well. Much better than other fast food pizza places. The cinnamon bread is where it‚Äôs at if you‚Äôre looking for some dessert.

name: Raymond Lunden
text: Not what I expected. Pizza was very bland, barely had veggies and not much cheese. We love Hungry Howie's from Florida but it's not the case in Texas. The flavored crust is pretty good.

name: Tiffany Lee
text: Im giving 4 stars because things started out rough but were quickly fixed by the owner, Caleb! Thank you Caleb for fixing things The kids love the garlic crust and the gluten free pizza!

name: Marc Richter
text: For my first time trying Hungry Howies I was impressed with the quality of pizza for the price. My pizza was fresh and the flavored crust was delicious. I will be back again!

text: Not the best I have called yet. The regular is too doughy and the thin crust was a bit too hard and burnt.

name: Elena Harris
text: Pizza was good, I like the idea of flavored crust. Went half ranch, half garlic. Ranch side was too salty. A little pricey.

name: Irene Kim
text: It tastes good. special dough~

text: I grew up with Hungry Howies  and they are the original pizza dough flavored crust makers in the industry.... the price point is affordable and great tasting products as well......
